34:1: a-lham-du  lil-laa-hil  lazee    la-hoo  maa  fis  sa-maa-waa-ti  wa-maa  fil  ar-di    wa-la-hul  ham-du    fil  aa-khi-rah   wa-hu-wal  hakee-mul  khabeer
34:2: ya-la-mu  maa  ya-li-ju  fil  ar-di    wa-maa  yak-hru-ju  mi-nhaa  wa-maa  yan-zi-lu  mi-nas  sa-maaai  wa-maa  ya-ru-ju  fee-haa  wa-hu-war  rahee-mul  gha-foor
34:3: wa-qaa-lal  lazee-na   ka-fa-roo  laa  taatee-nas  saaah      qul  ba-laa  wa-rab-bee  la-taa-tiyan-na-kum  aa-li-mul  ghaib      laa  ya-zu-bu  a-nhu  mis-qaa-lu  zar-ra-tin  fis  sa-maa-waa-ti  wa-laa  fil  ar-di    wa-laaa  as-gha-ru  min  zaa-li-ka  wa-laaa  ak-ba-ru  il-laa  fee  ki-taa-bim  mubeen

34:5: wal-la-zee-na  saaw   feee  aayaa-ti-naa  mu-a-a-ji-zee-na  u-laaai-ka  la-hum  a-zaa-bum  mir  rij-zin  aleem
34:6: waya-ral  lazee-na   oo-tul  il-mal     lazeee   un-zi-la  i-lai-ka  mir  rab-bi-ka  hu-wal  haq-qa   wayah-deee  i-laaa  si-raa-til  azee-zil   hameed
34:7: wa-qaa-lal  lazee-na   ka-fa-roo  hal  na-dul-lu-kum  a-laa  ra-ju-li-ny  yu-nab-biu-kum  i-zaa  muz-ziq-tum  kul-la  mu-maz-za-qin  in-na-kum  lafee  khal-qin  jadeed

34:9: a-fa-lam  ya-raw  i-laa  maa  bai-na  ay-dee-him  wa-maa  khal-fa-hum  mi-nas  sa-maaai  wa-lard   in  na-shad  nak-hsif  bi-hi-mul  ar-da    aw  nus-qit  a-lai-him  ki-sa-fam  mi-nas  sa-maaa   in-na  fee  zaa-li-ka  laaaya-tal  li-kul-li  ab-dim  muneeb

34:12: wa-li-su-lai-maa-nar  ree-ha   ghu-duw-wu-haa  shah-runw  wa-ra-waa-hu-haa  shah-runw  waa-sal-naa  la-hoo  ai-nal  qitr       wa-mi-nal  jin-ni   mai  ya-ma-lu  bai-na  ya-dai-hi  biiz-ni    rab-bih  wa-mai  ya-zigh  mi-nhum  an   am-ri-naa  nu-zi-qhu  min  a-zaa-bis  saeer
34:13: ya-ma-loo-na  la-hoo  ma  ya-shaaau  mim  ma-haa-ree-ba  wa-ta-maa-see-la  wa-ji-faa-nin  kal-ja-waa-bi  wa-qu-doo-rir  raa-siyaat  i-ma-loo  aa-la  daa-woo-da  shuk-raa  wa-qa-lee-lum  min  i-baa-diyash  sha-koor
34:14: fa-lam-maa  qa-dai-naa  a-lai-hil  maw-ta    ma  dal-la-hum  a-laa  maw-tiheee  il-laa  daaab-ba-tul  ar-di    taa-ku-lu  min-saa-ta-hoo  fa-lam-maa  khar-ra  ta-baiya-na-til  jin-nu   al  law  kaa-noo  ya-la-moo-nal  ghai-ba    maa  la-bi-soo  fil  a-zaa-bil   muheen
34:15: la-qad  kaa-na  li-sa-bain  fee  mas-ka-ni-him  aaya-tun  jan-na-taa-ni  a-ny  ya-mee-ninw  wa-shi-maa-lin  ku-loo  mir  riz-qi  rab-bi-kum  was-hku-roo  lah   bal-da-tun  taiyi-ba-tunw  wa-rab-bun  gha-foor

34:28: wa-maaa  ar-sal-naa-ka  il-laa  kaaf-fa-tal  lin-naa-si  ba-shee-ranw  wa-na-zee-ranw  wa-laa-kin-na  ak-sa-ran  naa-si   laa  ya-la-moon

34:31: wa-qaa-lal  lazee-na   ka-fa-roo  lan  nu-mi-na  bi-haa-zal  qu-raa-ni   wa-laa  bil-lazee   bai-na  ya-dayh  wa-law  ta-raaa  i-ziz  zaa-li-moo-na  maw-qoo-foo-na  in-da  rab-bi-him  yar-jiu  ba-du-hum  i-laa  ba-di-nil  qaw-la    ya-qoo-lul  lazee-nas  tu-di-foo   lil-la-zee-nas  tak-ba-roo  law-laaa  an-tum  la-kun-naa  mu-mineen
